notes: mass noun; plural "pani" used for loaves

example_sentence_italian: Ho comprato un pane al forno.
example_sentence_english: I bought a loaf of bread from the bakery.

notes: partitive (can mean "some bread" or "of the bread")
example_sentence_english: I would like some bread, please.
The loaves are on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Ho comprato dei pani per la festa.
example_sentence_english: I bought some loaves for the party.

example_sentence_italian: Aggiungi un po' d'olio al pane.
example_sentence_english: Add a bit of oil to the bread.
I added seeds to the loaves.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso una fetta dal pane.
example_sentence_english: I took a slice from the bread.

example_sentence_italian: Ho tolto delle fette dai pani.
example_sentence_english: I took slices from the loaves.

example_sentence_italian: C'è una bolla d'aria nel pane.
example_sentence_english: There's an air bubble in the bread.
Put the ham on the bread.

example_sentence_italian: Metti il burro sui pani caldi.
example_sentence_english: Put butter on the hot loaves.
I eat the soup with the bread.

example_sentence_italian: Ho fatto dei crostini coi pani avanzati.
example_sentence_english: I made croutons with the leftover loaves.
